iana.template_text:
(Last updated 27 June 2006)

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.chipnuts.karaoke-mmd

Required parameters : none

Optional parameters : none

Encoding considerations : binary
This media type may require encoding on transports not capable of handling binary.

Security considerations : 
1. in this media type, there is no any active or executable 
content, it only contains data of multimedia content itself and head 
information.
2. the information contained in the media type does not need privacy or integrity services.
3. since part of content( e.g. compressed MIDI) in this type of media is encripted and only can 
be descripted by hardware IP in our company's SoC product.any it is market proven (millions
IC has been integrated into handset). so it is assessed and market approved.

Interoperability considerations : 
None

Published specification : 
This content type is a combined binary file format where audio, video, lyric information 
is included in. Audio data is encapsulated by certain algorithm and could only be decoded 
by Chipnuts multimedia chipsets. Unicode is used for lyric information

Applications which use this media : 
This content type is used for enabling karaoke function in those mobile handsets where Chipnuts multimedia chipset is built in

Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : none
2. File extension(s) : mmd
3. Macintosh file type code : none
4. Object Identifiers: none

Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Xiong, Chunyun
2. Email : frankxiong&chipnuts.com

Intended usage : Common 

Author/Change controller : 

(file created 27 June 2006)
